name: T-180 Matryoshka
description:
This mod is a collaboration between Mad Agus and ohyeah2389. Mad Agus made the 3D model of the car, while ohyeah2389 made the physics and sound of the car.

It features twin rear-facing augmented turbojets and caged wheel hubs, along with small active-aero components at the rear.
author: Mad Agus and ohyeah2389
